summary:
WEREWOLF TOGGLE & IMPROVE
Improves Regen, Unarmed Damage, Most Wolves & Werewolves Do Not Attack, Transformation Time is Extended Dramatically.
descriptionHtml:
Forget this mod guys everything here has been achieved without having to use console commands, 
Just look up:
LFox Werewolf improvement mod
And tweak it with:
Skyedit

Cheers

First Attempt
 When the CK comes out will set it up with hot keys and know console commands cheers

I love the werewolves in this game: they look awesome, they\'re fun to play but they are too weak too be playable as you get to 
higher levels. 
This frustrated me and I didn\'t feel it was werewolf lore friendly in or out of the game.



WEREWOLF TOGGLE



*Spoiler Alert*

Most players will gain their werewolf ability from the companions who have supposedly mastered their bestial nature. 
To me this would suggest the ability to summon this form at will and return to normal as you see fit. 
So here are a couple of commands to turn into a werewolf at will!



Werewolf On

Go Into Console commands with Tilde Key (~)

Type \'bat WWon\' and press enter

Return to gameplay and your transformation will commence!



Werewolf Off

Go Into Console commands with Tilde Key (~)

Type \'bat WWoff\' and press enter 

Return to gamplay and you will begin to shift back!



WEREWOLF IMPROVE



You are more than an ordinary werewolf - you have the soul of a dragon! The werewolves I\'ve come to know and love over the years are
unstoppable raging beasts who can barely be wounded by anything bar silver as you watch their wounds close in front of you terrified 
because you know they can be on you in an instant with monstorus strength to tear your head from your shoulders. 
Even in human form they are stronger than ordinary men, faster able to heal quicker. 
Other wolves can smell your canis pheromones and know to generally keep clear because of the power you exude! 
You are also a companion and have mastered your bestial form and can now mainatiain it for almost an infinite amount of time.



For all the effects of these improves to be persistent the following commands must be entered AFTER you have completed transformation
to human or werewolf. 
This does mean you can chose to imrpove the werewolf form only if you like.



Man Form Improve
 
AFTER turning back human Go Into Console commands with Tilde Key (~)

Type \'bat barndog\' and press enter

When you return to gameplay you will be slightly faster.

You will heal quicker, about 1/2 again as fast.

You will do 50 extra unarmed damage as a true werewolf would.

Most other wolves and werewolves sense your nature and power and do not attack.



Werewolf Form Improve

AFTER turning into a werewolf Go Into Console commands with Tilde Key (~)

Type \'bat barnwolf\' and press enter

When you return to gameplay you will be much faster.

You will heal quicker, about 3 times as fast.

You will do 150 extra unarmed damage as a true werewolf would.

Most other wolves and werewolves sense your nature and power and do not attack.
 


Installation is simple:

Download and copy all files into data file in your skyrim directory.



Uninstall:

Delete the four text files from skyrim/data folder.



Thanks to all the werewolf improvers out there, gave me ideas especially this one

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1469



Anyone that can improve on this please do, 
I\'d love to have the improve and toggle as one command (especially a hotkey!!) 
but becuase the transformation isn\'t instant it affects all the improvements unless done like this when working with bat files. 
Needs to be scripted.
author: BARNDOG
